mean_cn: n. 突破，突破性进展，重要的新发现
mean_en: a sudden increase in knowledge, understanding, etc.; an important discovery that happens after trying for a long time to understand or explain something
sentence: After working through a lot of problems, he finally had a breakthrough to succeed.
sentence_trans: 解决了许多问题之后，他终于有了突破性进展。
